function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Data duplication in source code repositories leading to rapid evolution and fading out of topics in software engineering","Impact":"Inaccurate or unreliable software development trends, leading to outdated practices and inefficient solutions","Mitigation":"Implement effective data deduplication techniques and regular code reviews to identify and eliminate duplicated code","Technologies":"Code analysis and deduplication tools, version control systems","People":"Software developers, software engineering researchers","Owner":"Software development teams, research institutions"},{"Description":"Use of LDA and NMF for topic modeling and clustering in software engineering and bioinformatics","Impact":"Inaccurate topic clustering and modeling, leading to erroneous analysis and predictions","Mitigation":"Regular validation and testing of LDA and NMF models, integration of domain-specific knowledge and validation datasets","Technologies":"LDA, NMF, validation frameworks, domain-specific datasets","People":"Software engineers, bioinformaticians, data scientists","Owner":"Research institutions, software development organizations"}]}
